name: Cafardage Arena
description:
Welcome to the cockroach arena! Cafardage Arena is a cooperative survival game featuring 3 cockroach fighters who get stuck in an arena. This combat zone features cockroaches that seem to want to take on the heroes to entertain their audience. The heroes will have to fight for their survival and will be equipped with various knives and guns to repel the invasion.

Can you survive the cockroach invasion?

Playable from 1 to 3 players.
